meanings.definition: The quality or state of being prohibitive.
meanings.sent1: The prohibitivenesses of the price made it impossible for many to afford.
meanings.sent2: The prohibitivenesses of the rules deterred people from participating.
meanings.sent3: The prohibitivenesses of the dress code at the party led to some creative outfit choices.
meanings.sent4: The prohibitivenesses of the mountain's height made it seem unconquerable.
meanings.sent5: The prohibitivenesses of the security measures made the building feel impenetrable.

meanings.definition: The act of prohibiting or forbidding something.
meanings.sent1: The prohibitivenesses of the law were evident in the strict penalties imposed.
meanings.sent2: The prohibitivenesses of the ban on smoking were clear in public places.
meanings.sent3: The prohibitivenesses of the no-pet policy led to some sneaky attempts to bring pets in.
